channel.title: [Summoning] ~-~ 508
channel.description:
[b][i]I've decided to start summoning from scratch - I will be posting videos soon of what I've got.[/i][/b]
[center][i]Basic summoning system. Dreadfowl and Spirit Wolf only, working on the rest. Trying to get 100% summoning, here is a video. I've noticed that they only walk through trees and rocks, for some odd reason. This is just a small 2-hour peice of work. So it is nothing big, and it might be released so don't ask.
Video is a bit laggy but it's not my client/server it is just YouTube. Here; doesn't matter if it's in High Quality or Low Quality it's still good to read, both ways.
[url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=utrpx1TBquM][b]Check out the VIDEO![/b][/url]
Credits; Digital Hotdogs (Yep all me, don't say I leeched it either.)[/i][/center]
[b]Progress: You pick up a tab (Summoning Pouch) right click it, go to "Summon" it will summon a NPC. Working summons so far: Spirit Wolf Dreadfowl
The following is a bit of a fail, working on it.[/b]

item.description:
@Digital_Hotdogs wrote:

I’ve decided to start summoning from scratch - I will be posting videos soon of what I’ve got.

[center][i]Basic summoning system. Dreadfowl and Spirit Wolf only, working on the rest. Trying to get 100% summoning, here is a video. I’ve noticed that they only walk through trees and rocks, for some odd reason.
This is just a small 2-hour peice of work. So it is nothing big, and it might be released so don’t ask.

Video is a bit laggy but it’s not my client/server it is just YouTube.
Here; doesn’t matter if it’s in High Quality or Low Quality it’s still good to read, both ways.

Check out the VIDEO!

Credits; Digital Hotdogs (Yep all me, don’t say I leeched it either.)[/i][/center]

[b]Progress:
You pick up a tab (Summoning Pouch) right click it, go to “Summon” it will summon a NPC.
Working summons so far:
Spirit Wolf
Dreadfowl

The following is a bit of a fail, working on it.[/b]
